strapiPost.title: SEC Announces Men's Basketball 2022-23 Schedule
strapiPost.content:
The Southeastern Conference announced Arkansas’s 2022-23 SEC men’s basketball season schedule this week. Who’s pumped? 

  • Games: There are 18 games on the calendar, not including the SEC-Big 12 Challenge at Baylor University and the 2023 SEC Tournament in Nashville from March 8-12. Arkansas’s season will open on December 28 at LSU. 
  • At home: There will be nine home games this season. The first one is on January 4 against Missouri, and the regular-season finale will be versus Kentucky on March 4. Season tickets are already sold out, but you can virtually watch the games at the Bud Walton Arena here!

Click HERE for more information.
